class.name: CATLISTP(CATIBRepAccess)
class.abstract: Collection class for pointer to CATIBRepAccess interface.

class.name: CATLISTP(CATIRSur)
class.abstract: Collection class for pointers to CATIRSur interface.

class.name: CATLISTV(CATIBRepAccess_var)
class.abstract: Collection class for specobjects.

class.name: CATLISTV(CATIMf3DAxisSystem_var)
class.abstract: Collection class CATIMf3DAxisSystem interface handler.

class.name: CATMfErrUpdate
class.abstract: Class to create an update error.

class.name: CATMfError
class.abstract: Base class of the Mechanical Modeler errors.

class.name: CATVisuFeatureIterator
class.abstract: Class to use as an iterator over a set of feature.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Returns the next object of the iteration, NULL if it is over.

enum.name: CATAxisSystemPointType
enum.abstract: The axis system origin definition mode.

enum.name: CATMfBRepDecodeType
enum.abstract: Decode management when the selected cell is shared by several topological domains.

enum.name: CATMfBRepType
enum.abstract: Types for selecting objects and BRep features.

enum.name: CATMfNodeReportType
enum.abstract: Types for nodes of the generic naming graph.

enum.name: CATMmiDimension
enum.abstract: Types used to specify the geometry dimension of BRep feature.

enum.name: CATMmiDimensionType
enum.abstract: Types used to specify the geometry position of BRep feature.

enum.name: CATMmrLimitationType
enum.abstract: Types used to specify if the BRep feature need to take into account relimitations.

enum.name: CATMmrSupportType
enum.abstract: Types used to specify Support of BRep feature.

function.name: GetCATIABaseAccessFromSpec
function.abstract: Retrieves a valid CATIABase on feature.

function.name: GetCATIABaseAccessFromSpec
function.abstract: Retrieves a valid CATIABase on feature.

function.name: GetNullReference
function.abstract: Creates a reference on a NULL specification.

function.name: GetObjectFromReference
function.abstract: Generates or retrieves an object from a Reference on Geometry, BREP feature or Select Object.

function.name: GetReferenceFromSpec
function.abstract: Generates or retrieves a Reference from a feature.

function.name: GetSpecFromReference
function.abstract: Generates or retrieves a feature from a reference.

class.name: CATI3DGeometricalElement
class.abstract: Interface to handle the geometrical element.

class.name: CATIBRepAccess
class.abstract: Interface to manage a selecting object.

method.name: CreateBody
method.abstract: Returns the body created with cells followed in the generic naming graph.

method.name: CreateBody
method.abstract: Creates the body created with cells associated with the selecting object.

method.name: GetAncestors
method.abstract: Returns the grandparents of the selecting object.

method.name: GetBRepElementType
method.abstract: Reads the selecting object type.

method.name: GetBReps
method.abstract: Returns the selecting objects with the same topological dimension.

method.name: GetBReps
method.abstract: Returns selecting objects according to a specified dimension.

method.name: GetBReps
method.abstract: Returns selecting objects with the same topological dimension.

method.name: GetBReps
method.abstract: Returns selecting objects according to a specified dimension.

method.name: GetCells
method.abstract: Returns the cells associated with the selecting object.

method.name: GetCells
method.abstract: Returns the cells with a specified dimension and associated with the selecting object.

method.name: GetCells
method.abstract: Returns the cells associated with the children nodes of the selecting object.

method.name: GetCells
method.abstract: Returns the cells with a specified dimension and associated with the selecting object.

method.name: GetConnexity
method.abstract: Returns the connectivity of a selecting object.

method.name: GetConnexity
method.abstract: Returns the connectivity of a selecting object.

method.name: GetDimension
method.abstract: Returns the topological dimension of a selecting object.

method.name: GetGeometries
method.abstract: Returns the Geometry associated to a selecting object.

method.name: GetGeometries
method.abstract: Returns the cells associated with the selecting object.

method.name: GetInitialFeature
method.abstract: Returns the youngest feature according to the history of the mechanical part, that generated the selecting object.

method.name: GetInitialFeature
method.abstract: Returns the oldest feature, according to the history of the mechanical part, that generated the selecting object.

method.name: GetInitialMasterFeature
method.abstract: Returns the visible feature that generated the selecting object.

method.name: GetLastFeature
method.abstract: Returns the feature that generated the selecting object.

method.name: GetMechanicalExtendedLabel
method.abstract: Creates the extended label.

method.name: GetNecessaryFeatures
method.abstract: Returns the features involved in the selecting object definition.

method.name: GetNecessaryFeatures
method.abstract: Returns the features involved in the selecting object definition.

method.name: GetSelectingBody
method.abstract: Returns the body that contains the selected cell.

method.name: GetSelectingCell
method.abstract: Returns the selected cell.

method.name: GetSelectingFeature
method.abstract: Returns the feature containing the selected object.

method.name: GetSelectingHighDimension
method.abstract: Returns the high topological dimension of the domain that contains the selected cell.

method.name: GetSelectingLowDimension
method.abstract: Returns the low topological dimension of the domain that contains the selected cell.

method.name: GetSelectingMasterFeature
method.abstract: Returns the parent feature of the feature containing the selected object.

method.name: GetValidity
method.abstract: Reads the object validity.

method.name: IsABRep
method.abstract: Reads the selecting object type status.

method.name: IsImpactedBy
method.abstract: Analyses if the selecting object involves a specified feature.

method.name: IsImpactedBy
method.abstract: Analyses if the selecting object involves a specified feature.

method.name: IsInfinite
method.abstract: Returns the infinite property of a selecting object.

method.name: IsSame
method.abstract: Returns 1 if the selecting objects are same.

method.name: IsSameLabel
method.abstract: Returns 1 if the labels of selecting objects are same.

method.name: IsSolvable
method.abstract: Returns 1 if the the selecting object can be solved in the body of the <tt>ResultOUT</tt> of iFeature object.

method.name: IsValid
method.abstract: Reads the object validity status.

method.name: ResolveFaces
method.abstract: Returns the associated faces followed by the generic naming graph.

method.name: ResolveFaces
method.abstract: Returns the faces associated to a selecting object.

method.name: UnGroup
method.abstract: Returns the children of the selecting object in the generic naming graph.

class.name: CATIBasicTool
class.abstract: Interface to identify Body features and get included Body features.

method.name: GetIncludedTools
method.abstract: Retrieves included Body features at first level.

class.name: CATIBodyRequest
class.abstract: Interface to retrieve the result of a geometrical feature set.

method.name: GetResults
method.abstract: Retrieves the result of a geometrical feature set.

class.name: CATIBorderFVertex
class.abstract: Interface to filter a selecting object of BorderFVertex type.

class.name: CATIBorderREdge
class.abstract: Interface to filter a selecting object of BorderREdge type.

class.name: CATIBuildShape
class.abstract: Interface to implement to extend new mechanical feature types.

method.name: BuildShape
method.abstract: Builds the local (print) solid of a mechanical feature.

class.name: CATICharacteristicAxis
class.abstract: Interface to get the selecting object associated with an axis.

method.name: GetRSur
method.abstract: Returns the surface type selecting object associated with the axis type selecting object.

class.name: CATICharacteristicExtremity
class.abstract: Interface to get the selecting object associated with an extremity.

method.name: GetRSur
method.abstract: Returns the surface type selecting object associated with the extremity type selecting object.

class.name: CATICharacteristicGeomElem
class.abstract: Interface to get basic geometrical knowledge of the element.

method.name: GetAnchorPoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the feature anchor point.

method.name: GetReferenceNormal
method.abstract: Retrieves the feature reference normal.

class.name: CATICharacteristicPlanarSubElement
class.abstract: Interface to get the selecting object associated with a planar subelement.

method.name: GetRSur
method.abstract: Returns the surface type selecting object associated with the planar subelement type selecting object.

class.name: CATIContainerOfDocument
class.abstract: Interface to retrieve the main containers of a Part document.

method.name: GetBRepContainer
method.abstract: Returns the BRep container of the document.

method.name: GetProductContainer
method.abstract: Returns the product container of the document.

method.name: GetResultContainer
method.abstract: Returns the result container of the document.

method.name: GetSpecContainer
method.abstract: Returns the specification container of the document.

class.name: CATIDatumFactory

method.name: InstanciateDatum
method.abstract: Creates a datum feature.

method.name: InstanciateDatum
method.abstract: Creates a datum feature.

class.name: CATIFVertex
class.abstract: Interface to manage a selecting object of FVertex type.

method.name: GetRSurs
method.abstract: Returns the selecting objects associated with the adjacent faces.

method.name: GetVertices
method.abstract: Returns the geometrical vertices corresponding to the FVertex.

class.name: CATIFVertexAccess
class.abstract: Interface to filter a selecting object of Vertex types.

class.name: CATIFeaturize
class.abstract: Interface to create a BRep feature from a selecting object or to duplicate a BRep feature.

method.name: FeaturizeBorder
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature of type border edge or border vertex.

method.name: FeaturizeBorder
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature of type border edge or border vertex.

method.name: FeaturizeBorder
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature of type border edge only.

method.name: FeaturizeBorder
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature of type border edge only.

method.name: FeaturizeF
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature as a functional element.

method.name: FeaturizeF
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature as a functional element.

method.name: FeaturizeR
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature as a relimited element.

method.name: FeaturizeR
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature as a relimited element.

method.name: FeaturizeR
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature as a relimited element.

method.name: FeaturizeR
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature as a relimited element.

method.name: FeaturizeWire
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature of type wire edge or wire vertex.

method.name: FeaturizeWire
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature of type wire edge.

method.name: FeaturizeWire
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature of type wire edge only.

method.name: FeaturizeWire
method.abstract: Creates a BRep feature of type wire edge only.

class.name: CATIGSMTool
class.abstract: Interface to manage a GSMTool feature.

method.name: AutoSortComponents
method.abstract: Automatical sort of components inside the surfacic body.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Retrieves the type of the surfacic body.

method.name: IsPrivate
method.abstract: Retrieves the private mode of the surfacic body.

method.name: SetPrivate
method.abstract: Sets in private mode the surfacic body.

method.name: SetType
method.abstract: Sets the type of the surfacic body.

class.name: CATIGeometricalElement
class.abstract: Interface to manage a geometrical feature.

method.name: GetBRepFeatures
method.abstract: Returns the list of BRep features that involve the current feature.

method.name: GetBodyResult
method.abstract: Returns the result topological body associated with the current feature.

method.name: GetCharacteristicDirections
method.abstract: Retrieves the inertia directions of the current feature.

method.name: GetCharacteristicPoints
method.abstract: Retrieves the bounding box center of gravity and the bounding box extremities.

class.name: CATIIsolate
class.abstract: Interface to isolate a feature.

method.name: Isolate
method.abstract: Isolates a feature.

class.name: CATIMechanicalCCP
class.abstract: Interface for copy, paste, delete, drag and drop operations.

method.name: CanBeCopied
method.abstract: Returns if a feature can be copied in "As specified in Part document" format.

method.name: CanBeDeleted
method.abstract: Returns if a feature can be deleted.

method.name: GetAnchorPoint
method.abstract: Returns the anchor point.

method.name: GetReferenceNormal
method.abstract: Returns the reference normal.

method.name: GiveMeYourFavoriteSpecifications
method.abstract: Returns the main specifications.

method.name: IsElementValidForPaste
method.abstract: Returns if an element is valid for a paste operation on a selected element.

class.name: CATIMechanicalFeature
class.abstract: Interface to recognize a mechanical feature.

method.name: ChangeMechanicalFather
method.abstract: Reassigns the composite object of the current feature.

method.name: GetMechanicalFather
method.abstract: Returns the composite object if it is a mechanical feature.

method.name: GetPart
method.abstract: Returns the mechanical part to which belongs the current feature.

class.name: CATIMechanicalProperties
class.abstract: Interface to manage the build activation of a GeometricalElement feature.

method.name: Activate
method.abstract: Activates a geometrical feature.

method.name: InActivate
method.abstract: Deactivates a geometrical feature.

method.name: IsInactive
method.abstract: Returns the activation status of a geometrical feature.

class.name: CATIMechanicalRootFactory
class.abstract: Interface to create mechanical bodies.

method.name: CreateGeometricalSet
method.abstract: Creates a Geometrical Set.

method.name: CreateOrderedGeometricalSet
method.abstract: Creates an Ordered Geometrical Set.

method.name: CreatePRTTool
method.abstract: Creates a MechanicalTool.

method.name: CreatePRTTool
method.abstract: Creates a MechanicalTool at a given position.

class.name: CATIMechanicalTool
class.abstract: Interface to manage a MechanicalTool feature.

method.name: GetBooleanOperation
method.abstract: Returns the boolean operation when the current solid body is operated.

method.name: GetFirstShapeFeature
method.abstract: Returns the first solid feature.

method.name: GetLastShapeFeature
method.abstract: Returns the last solid feature.

method.name: GetLastShapeFeatureSuccessfullyUpdated
method.abstract: Returns the last activated solid feature without update error.

class.name: CATIMechanicalVisu
class.abstract: Interface to set the visualization status of mechanical features.

method.name: GetHideStatus
method.abstract: Returns the visualization status.

method.name: GetVisuStatus
method.abstract: Returns the visualization status.

method.name: Is3DVisible
method.abstract: Returns the effective visibility in 3D view.

method.name: SetHideStatus
method.abstract: Sets the visualization status.

method.name: SetVisuStatus
method.abstract: Sets the visualization status.

class.name: CATIMf3DAxisSystem
class.abstract: Interface for an axis system.

method.name: GetAxisBRepAccess
method.abstract: Retrieves the BRep object of the X, Y or Z axis.

method.name: GetAxisDirection
method.abstract: Retrieves the geometrical feature which defines an axis direction.

method.name: GetAxisRotationParm
method.abstract: Retrieves the rotation angle parameter.

method.name: GetAxisRotationReference
method.abstract: Retrieves the reference's geometry for the rotation about the rotation axis.

method.name: GetAxisSystemType
method.abstract: Retrieves the axis system type.

method.name: GetAxisType
method.abstract: Retrieves the axis direction definition mode.

method.name: GetBRepAlias
method.abstract: Retrieves the name of a BRep object of the axis system.

method.name: GetEulerAnglesParm
method.abstract: Retrieves the Euler angle parameters.

method.name: GetMathAxis
method.abstract: Retrieves the mathematical axis system.

method.name: GetOrigin
method.abstract: Retrieves the origin location with a mathematical point.

method.name: GetOriginPoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the geometrical feature which defines the origin.

method.name: GetOriginPointBRepAccess
method.abstract: Retrieves the BRep object of the origin point.

method.name: GetOriginType
method.abstract: Retrieves the origin definition mode.

method.name: GetParm
method.abstract: Retrieves the internal parameters of the axis system.

method.name: GetPlaneBRepAccess
method.abstract: Retrieves the BRep object of the YZ, ZX or XY plane.

method.name: GetVectors
method.abstract: Retrieves the X axis and Y axis directions.

method.name: IsCurrent
method.abstract: Retrieves if the axis system is the current one.

method.name: IsDirect
method.abstract: Retrieves the axis system orientation.

method.name: SetAxisDirection
method.abstract: Sets a geometrical feature to define an axis direction.

method.name: SetAxisRotationReference
method.abstract: Valuates the reference's geometry for the rotation about the rotation axis.

method.name: SetAxisSystemType
method.abstract: Sets the axis system type.

method.name: SetAxisType
method.abstract: Sets the axis direction definition mode.

method.name: SetMathAxis
method.abstract: Valuates the axis system with a mathematical axis system.

method.name: SetOrigin
method.abstract: Valuates the origin location with a mathematical point.

method.name: SetOriginPoint
method.abstract: Sets a geometrical feature to define the origin.

method.name: SetOriginType
method.abstract: Sets the origin definition mode.

method.name: SetVectors
method.abstract: Valuates the axis directions.

class.name: CATIMf3DAxisSystemFactory
class.abstract: Interface to create an axis system.

method.name: CreateAxisSystem
method.abstract: Creates an axis system from a mathematical axis system.

method.name: CreateAxisSystem
method.abstract: Creates an axis system from knowledge parameters.

method.name: CreateAxisSystem
method.abstract: Creates an axis system from another axis system.

method.name: CreateAxisSystem
method.abstract: Creates an axis system from one point and 2 vectors.

method.name: CreateExplicitAxisSystem
method.abstract: Creates an explicit axis system.

class.name: CATIMf3DAxisSystemManager
class.abstract: Interface to manage the axis systems.

method.name: ConvertPointCoordinates
method.abstract: Converts point coordinates in the current axis system.

method.name: ConvertVectorCoordinates
method.abstract: Converts vector coordinates in the current axis system.

method.name: GetAxisSystems
method.abstract: Retrieves all the axis systems of the Part document.

method.name: GetCurrentAxisSystem
method.abstract: Retrieves the current axis system.

method.name: SetCurrentAxisSystem
method.abstract: Sets an axis system as the current one.

class.name: CATIMf3DBehavior
class.abstract: Interface characterizing the mechanical modeler behaviors of geometrical features.

method.name: IsADatum
method.abstract: Indicates whether a feature is a datum feature.

method.name: IsAShape
method.abstract: Indicates whether a feature is a surface feature.

method.name: IsASolid
method.abstract: Indicates whether a feature is a solid feature.

class.name: CATIMf3DBehavior2
class.abstract: Interface extending CATIMf3DBehavior.

method.name: IsAVolume
method.abstract: Tells whether the feature is a volume feature.

class.name: CATIMfAxis
class.abstract: Interface to get an axis BRep feature.

method.name: GetFeatSupport
method.abstract: Returns the support.

class.name: CATIMfBRep
class.abstract: Interface to manage BRep features.

method.name: CreateBody
method.abstract: Creates the body according to the build type.

method.name: CreateSickBody
method.abstract: Creates the sick body in case of update error.

method.name: GetBRep
method.abstract: Returns the selecting objects associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetBRepBuildType
method.abstract: Returns the build type.

method.name: GetBRepType
method.abstract: Returns BRep type.

method.name: GetBody
method.abstract: Returns the body associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetBrepFtrCells
method.abstract: Retrieves the cells associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetBrepFtrGeometryType
method.abstract: Retrieves the type of geometry pointed by the BRep Feature.

method.name: GetBrepFtrNecessaryFeatures
method.abstract: Retrieves all the Features associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetCells
method.abstract: Returns the cells associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetConnexity
method.abstract: Returns the connectivity of the BRep feature.

method.name: GetEdges
method.abstract: Returns the topological edges <tt>CATEdge</tt> associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetFaces
method.abstract: Returns the topological faces associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetFaces
method.abstract: Returns the topological faces associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetGeometry
method.abstract: Returns the geometrical objects associated with the cells of the BRep feature.

method.name: GetMasterSupport
method.abstract: Returns the support as a shape feature displayed in the specification tree.

method.name: GetNbSur
method.abstract: Returns the number of surfaces associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetNecessaryFeatures
method.abstract: Returns the list of features involved in the BRep feature definition.

method.name: GetRSurs
method.abstract: Returns the surface selecting objects associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetRSurs
method.abstract: Returns the surface selecting objects associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetSickBody
method.abstract: Returns the sick body in case of update error.

method.name: GetSickCells
method.abstract: Returns the sick cells in case of update error.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Returns the support.

method.name: IsABRep
method.abstract: Returns True if <tt>iType</tt> is the correct type, otherwise False.

method.name: IsAIntersectionBRep
method.abstract: Returns True if <tt>MfIntersectionBRep</tt> is the correct type, otherwise False.

method.name: IsASuperBRep
method.abstract: Returns True if <tt>iType</tt> is the correct type, otherwise False.

method.name: IsCompatibleWith
method.abstract: Returns True if the selecting object <tt>iBRep</tt> can generate a <tt>this</tt> type BRep feature.

method.name: IsImpactedBy
method.abstract: Analyses if the BRep feature involves the input feature.

method.name: IsSame
method.abstract: Returns 1 if the labels are same.

method.name: IsSame
method.abstract: Returns 1 if the BRep feature is same as <tt>iObject</tt>.

method.name: IsSolvable
method.abstract: Returns 1 if the BRep feature can be solved.

method.name: Modify
method.abstract: Changes the definition of the BRep feature with the <tt>iNewBrep</tt> definition.

method.name: Modify
method.abstract: Changes the definition of the BRep feature with the <tt>iNewBrep</tt> definition.

method.name: UpdateSupport
method.abstract: Updates the support.

method.name: UpdateSupport
method.abstract: Updates the support.

method.name: CreateMfRBRep

class.name: CATIMfIntersectApplicativeResolution

method.name: GetResolutionEdges

class.name: CATIMfIntersectionEdge
class.abstract: Interface for Intersection Edges BRep features.

method.name: GetEdgeInit
method.abstract: Retrieves the initial edge.

method.name: GetEdgesAllInit

method.abstract: Returns the oriented topological edges associated with the BRep Feature.

enum.name: CATMfIntersectionEdgeType

enum.name: CATMfTangentPropagationMode

class.name: CATIMfLine

method.abstract: Returns the support.

method.name: GetGNOrientation
method.abstract: Reads the local edge and the generic naming orientation of the edge.

method.abstract: Reads the local ration and the associated edge.

method.abstract: Computes the local ratio and the associated edge from a 3D point.

method.abstract: Reads the point on curve, the curve, the edge and the orientation of the curve according to the edge.

method.name: GetRatio
method.abstract: Returns the global ratio.

method.name: GetRatioFromPoint
method.abstract: Computes the glogal ratio from a 3D point.

method.name: GetSickMathPoint
method.abstract: Reads the sick point in case of update error.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Returns the <tt>CATIMfRedge</tt> support.

method.name: GetWire
method.abstract: Reads the wire and the orientation of the local edge according to the wire.

method.name: IsSame
method.abstract: Returns 1 if the points on edge are same.

method.name: SetRatio
method.abstract: Sets the global ratio.

class.name: CATIMfProcReport
class.abstract: Interface to create a generic naming scope with a procedural report.

method.name: CreateProcReport
method.abstract: Creates a report.

method.name: DeleteProcReport
method.abstract: Deletes the current report.

method.name: GetCGMJournalList
method.abstract: Reads the topological journal.

method.name: GetGeoFactoryFromFeature
method.abstract: Gets the geometrical factory.

method.name: InactivateResult
method.abstract: Inactivates the result of a geometrical feature.

method.name: InsertCGMJournalList
method.abstract: Inserts a new topological journal.

method.name: SetProcTranslateRule
method.abstract: Adds a rule on the journal.

method.name: StoreProcReport
method.abstract: Stores the report.

class.name: CATIMfRedge
class.abstract: Interface to manage a selecting feature of Redge (for relimited edge) type.

method.name: GetEdges
method.abstract: Returns the geometrical edges associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: GetEdges
method.abstract: Returns the geometrical edges associated with the BRep feature.

method.name: IsSharp
method.abstract: Returns the sharpness of the geometrical edge associated with the BRep feature.

class.name: CATIMfResultManagement
class.abstract: Interface to create a generic naming scope without a procedural report.

method.name: CreateScopeResult
method.abstract: Creates result of geometrical feature.

method.name: CreateScopeResult
method.abstract: Creates result of the geometrical feature.

method.name: DeleteScopeResult
method.abstract: Deletes result of the geometrical feature.

class.name: CATIMfRsur
class.abstract: Interface to filter a selecting feature of Rsur (for relimited surface) type.

class.name: CATIMfTriDimResult
class.abstract: Interface to filter features whose topological result is three dimensional.

class.name: CATIMfWireFvertex
class.abstract: Interface to filter a selecting feature of WireFVertex type.

class.name: CATIMfWireRedge
class.abstract: Interface to filter a selecting feature of WireRedge type.

class.name: CATIMfZeroDimResult
class.abstract: Interface to filter features whose topological result is zero dimensional.

class.name: CATIMmDecodeSubElem
class.abstract: Interface to find the sub-elements that generate a given result.

method.name: GetSpecificBRepAccess
method.abstract: Gets the list of CATIBRepAccess corresponding to Sketch sub-elements.

method.name: GetSpecificFeatures
method.abstract: Gets the list of sub-elements that specifically generates the give BRep.

class.name: CATIMmiBRepAttributeSynchronize
class.abstract: Interface to synchronize attributes that have been copied on the Import Feature.

method.name: GetBRepAttributeStatus
method.abstract: Returns the synchronized status of the BRep attributes.

method.name: SynchronizeBRepAttributes
method.abstract: Synchronizes the BRep attributes.

class.name: CATIMmiGeometricalSet
class.abstract: Interface identifying a surfacic body.

class.name: CATIMmiInternalCopyWithLink
class.abstract: Interface to manage internal copy with link.

method.name: GetSelectedElement
method.abstract: Returns the reference of the copy.

class.name: CATIMmiInternalCopyWithLinkEdition
class.abstract: Interface used to change the reference of an internal copy with link.

method.name: SetSelectedElement
method.abstract: Sets the reference of the copy.

class.name: CATIMmiMechanicalImportApplicative
class.abstract: Interface to manage an applicative mechanical import (or external reference).

method.name: BreakLink
method.abstract: Breaks a link associated to an applicative mechanical import.

method.name: GetPointedElement
method.abstract: Retrieves the pointed element.

method.name: GetSourceProduct
method.abstract: Retrieves the product instance which aggregates an instance of the representation of the pointed element.

method.name: IsPointedElementLoaded
method.abstract: Retrieves the loading status of the pointed document.

method.name: LoadPointedElement
method.abstract: Loads the pointed document containing the pointed element.

method.name: SetApplicativeId
method.abstract: Sets the applicative identifier.

method.name: SetPointedElementClientId
method.abstract: Sets the client identifier of the pointed element.

class.name: CATIMmiNonOrderedGeometricalSet
class.abstract: Interface identifying a Geometrical Set.

class.name: CATIMmiOrderedGeometricalSet
class.abstract: Interface identifying an Ordered Geometrical Set.

method.name: SetDatumMode

method.name: SetGridFilterMode
method.abstract: Sets the "Grid Filter" mode.

method.name: SetHistoricalGraphDisplayState
method.abstract: Sets the "Historical graph" display state.

method.name: SetImportRepRepMode
method.abstract: Sets the "ImportRepRep" mode.

method.name: SetInsertMode
method.abstract: Sets the Insert mode.

method.name: SetIntersectionC1EdgeMode
method.abstract: Sets the "Intersection C1Edge" mode.

method.name: SetIntersectionEdgeMode
method.abstract: Sets the "Intersection Edge" mode.

method.name: SetScanGraphPanelMode
method.abstract: Sets the visibility of the "Scan graph" panel.

method.name: SetSketchAnalysisDisplayState
method.abstract: Sets the "SketchAnalysisDisplay" state.

method.name: SetSocietyIdentifier
method.abstract: Sets the society identifier.

method.name: SetUnderAxisSystemsNodeMode
method.abstract: Sets the "Under axis system" mode.

method.name: ValidateDatumMode
method.abstract: Sets the mode to NoMode if it is set to TemporaryMode.

method.name: ValidateGridFilterMode
method.abstract: Sets the mode to NoMode if it is set to TemporaryMode.

method.name: ValidateInsertMode
method.abstract: Sets the mode to NoMode if it is set to TemporaryMode.

method.name: ValidateIntersectionC1EdgeMode
method.abstract: Sets the mode to NoMode if it is set to TemporaryMode.

method.name: ValidateIntersectionEdgeMode
method.abstract: Sets the mode to NoMode if it is set to TemporaryMode.

class.name: CATIMmiResultFreeze
class.abstract: Interface to freeze an element of the CATPart.

method.name: Freeze
method.abstract: Freeze the feature.

method.name: IsFrozen
method.abstract: Tell if the feature is frozen.

method.name: Unfreeze
method.abstract: Unfreeze the feature.

class.name: CATIMmiTemporaryVisProperties
class.abstract: Interface to apply temporary graphic properties.

method.name: ResetTemporaryVisProperties
method.abstract: Erases temporary graphic properties, and restores the 3D visualization.

method.name: SetTemporaryVisProperties
method.abstract: Applies temporary graphic properties, and refreshes 3D visualization.

class.name: CATIPartRequest
class.abstract: Interface to retrieve the geometrical features sets of the Part document.

method.name: GetAllBodies
method.abstract: Retrieves all root Bodies, all GS and all root OGS.

method.name: GetDirectBodies
method.abstract: Retrieves all root geometrical feature sets (all root Bodies,all root OGS and all root GS).

method.name: GetDirectBodiesChangeEvent
method.abstract: Retrieves the event that is dispatched when the list of root geometrical feature sets change.

method.name: GetMainBody
method.abstract: Retrieves the main Body.

method.name: GetSolidBodies
method.abstract: Retrieves all root Bodies.

method.name: GetSurfBodies
method.abstract: Retrieves all GS and all root OGS.

class.name: CATIPersistentSubElement
class.abstract: Interface allowing the manipulation of Applicative Attributes.

method.name: AddAttribute
method.abstract: Adds a new attribute.

method.name: GetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the value of an attribute.

method.name: GetAttributes
method.abstract: Retrieves the names and the respective values of all attributes.

method.name: GetDirectAttributes
method.abstract: Retrieves the names and the respective values of all attributes which rely on a specific feature.

method.name: GetListAttributesName
method.abstract: Retrieves the names of all the attributes.

method.name: GetListOfDirectAttributesName
method.abstract: Retrieves the names of all attributes which rely on a specific feature.

method.name: GetVisPropertiesAccess
method.abstract: Provides access to the visual properties of the current sub-element.

method.name: RemoveAttribute
method.abstract: Removes an attribute.

method.name: RemoveAttributes
method.abstract: Removes multiple attributes at once.

method.name: SetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Sets a new value to an existing attribute.

method.name: SetAttributes
method.abstract: Sets the values of every attribute in a list.

class.name: CATIPrtContainer
class.abstract: Interface to retrieve the MechanicalPart feature.

method.name: GetGeometricContainer
method.abstract: Returns the geometrical container.

method.name: GetPart
method.abstract: Returns the MechanicalPart feature.

class.name: CATIPrtPart
class.abstract: Interface to retrieve information on the MechanicalPart feature.

method.name: GetBodyForExternalReferences
method.abstract: Returns the feature containing external references of a contextual part.

method.name: GetCurrentFeature
method.abstract: Returns the current feature of the MechanicalPart feature.

method.name: GetCurrentTool
method.abstract: Returns the current set of the MechanicalPart feature.

method.name: GetDefaultValuesBag
method.abstract: Returns the feature holding the set of default values.

method.name: GetElectedFeature
method.abstract: Returns the elected feature of the MechanicalPart feature.

method.name: GetImportedBodies
method.abstract: Returns the list of the imported body features in the MechanicalPart feature.

method.name: GetProduct
method.abstract: Returns the product associated with the MechanicalPart feature.

method.name: GetReferencePlanes
method.abstract: Returns a list containing the reference planes of the MechanicalPart feature.

method.name: GetRelayToElectedFeature
method.abstract: Returns the relay feature to the elected feature of the MechanicalPart feature.

method.name: SetCurrentFeature
method.abstract: Sets the current feature of the MechanicalPart feature.

class.name: CATIPrtProceduralView
class.abstract: Interface to insert and reorder a solid feature into a procedural body.

method.name: InsertInProceduralView
method.abstract: Inserts a solid feature into a procedural body.

method.name: Reorder
method.abstract: Relocates a solid feature in the procedural body.

class.name: CATIREdge
class.abstract: Interface to manage a selecting object of IREdge type.

method.name: GetEdges
method.abstract: Returns the geometrical edges associated with the selecting object.

method.name: GetRSur
method.abstract: Returns the adjacent surface selecting object associated with the edge selecting object.

method.name: IsAIntersectionREdge
method.abstract: Returns True if the selecting object is an intersection edge.

method.name: IsSharp
method.abstract: Returns 1 if the edge is sharp.

method.name: IsSharp
method.abstract: Returns 1 if the edge is sharp.

class.name: CATIREdgeAccess
class.abstract: Interface to filter a selecting object of REdge types.

class.name: CATIRSur
class.abstract: Interface to manage the RSur type of selecting objects.

method.name: GetFaces
method.abstract: Returns the geometrical faces associated with the selecting object.

class.name: CATIShapeFeatureBody
class.abstract: Interface to manage solid features.

method.name: GetBodyIN
method.abstract: Returns the topological result associated with the ResultIN attribute.

method.name: GetBodyINAttributes
method.abstract: Returns the ResultIN attribute.

method.name: GetBodyOUT
method.abstract: Returns the topological result associated with the ResultOUT attribute.

method.name: GetNextShape
method.abstract: Returns the solid feature following the current feature in the procedural view.

method.name: GetPreviousShape
method.abstract: Returns the solid feature prior to the current feature in the procedural view.

method.name: GetResultOUT
method.abstract: Returns the ResultOUT attribute value.

method.name: GetShape
method.abstract: Returns the topology associated with the feature.

method.name: ListNextShapeFeatures
method.abstract: Returns all the solid features following the current feature in the procedural view.

method.name: ListPreviousShapeFeatures
method.abstract: Returns all the solid features prior to the current feature in the procedural view.

class.name: CATIShapeFeatureProperties
class.abstract: Interface to retrieve characteristics of a solid feature.

method.name: CanBePatterned
method.abstract: Returns if the current solid feature can be patterned.

method.name: GetPolarity
method.abstract: Returns the polarity of the current solid feature.

method.name: GiveMeYourBRepSpecifications
method.abstract: Returns all the BRep specifications of the current solid feature.

method.name: GiveMeYourFavoriteSketches
method.abstract: Returns specific sketches of the current solid feature.

method.name: IsAContextualFeature
method.abstract: Returns if the current solid feature is contextual.

method.name: IsAFreeFormFeature
method.abstract: Returns if the current solid feature is a form feature.

class.name: CATIUpdateError
class.abstract: Interface to manage update error associated with mechanical features.

method.name: GetFullDiagnostic
method.abstract: Returns all the chained sick features diagnoses.

method.name: GetUpdateError
method.abstract: Gets the update error associated with the feature.

method.name: SetUpdateError
method.abstract: Associates an update error to the current feature.

method.name: TestExistingUpdateError
method.abstract: Gets a value indicating whether an update error is associated with the current feature.

method.name: UnsetUpdateError
method.abstract: Unsets the update error associated with the feature.

class.name: CATIVisuHierarchy
class.abstract: Interface to define the visual hierarchy of a mechanical feature.

method.name: GetVisualizedChildren
method.abstract: Returns an iterator to parse the children that should be visualized.

method.name: GetVisualizingParent
method.abstract: Returns an iterator to parse the parents that visualize an object.

class.name: CATIWireFVertex
class.abstract: Interface to filter a selecting object of WireFVertex type.

class.name: CATIWireREdge
class.abstract: Interface to filter a selecting object of WireREdge type.

typedef.name: CATCstAttrType
typedef.abstract: Types used to specify constraint attribute type.

typedef.name: CATCstAttrVal
typedef.abstract: Type used to specify constraint attribute values.
